headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data: https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com; connect-src 'self' https://*.steamstatic.com https://*.steampowered.com https://cors-anywhere.herokuapp.com;
